snippet: Billy Parrott presides over what the New York Public Library says is the world's largest circulating collection of pictures, a favorite resource for Andy Warhol, Art Spiegelman and others.
abstract: Billy Parrott presides over what the New York Public Library says is the world's largest circulating collection of pictures, a favorite resource for Andy Warhol, Art Spiegelman and others.

headline.main: More Than a Pretty Picture, 1.2 Million of Them
headline.print_headline: 1.2 Million Images, Google Search Not Required
